column4: new user question ... i download virtualbox-3.0_3.0.8-53138_Ubuntu_jaunty_i386.deb and i have version 2 already install , how do i upgrade packages in ubuntu ?
if you have got old version, with new .deb packet it will update automatically
i am getting an error "virtualbox-3.0 conflicts with virtualbox virtualbox-2.2 provides virtualbox and is present and installed"
sudo apt-get purge virtualbox   | sudo apt-get autoremove virtualbox    | and then install .deb
